verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they turn <S%H7725><s%> and encamp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pihahiroth <S%H6367><s%>, between Migdol <S%H4024><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%>, over against <S%H6440><s%> Baalzephon <S%H1189><s%>: before <S%H5226><s%> it shall ye encamp <S%H2583><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

For Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, They are entangled <S%H943><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> hath shut them in <S%H5462><s%>.

And I will harden <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, that he shall follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and I will be honoured <S%H3513><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his host <S%H2428><s%>; that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. And they did <S%H6213><s%> so.

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%>: and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and of his servants <S%H5650><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> against the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they said <S%H559><s%>, Why have we done <S%H6213><s%> this, that we have let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> from serving <S%H5647><s%> us?
And he made ready <S%H631><s%> his chariot <S%H7393><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with him:

And he took <S%H3947><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and all the chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and captains <S%H7991><s%> over every one of them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and he pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> with an high <S%H7311><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

But the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, all the horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and his horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and his army <S%H2428><s%>, and overtook <S%H5381><s%> them encamping <S%H2583><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, beside Pihahiroth <S%H6367><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Baalzephon <S%H1189><s%>.

And when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> drew nigh <S%H7126><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and, behold, the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> marched <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and they were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried out <S%H6817><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Because there were no graves <S%H6913><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, hast thou taken us away <S%H3947><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>? wherefore <S%H2063><s%> hast thou dealt <S%H6213><s%> thus with us, to carry us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

Is not this the word <S%H1697><s%> that we did tell <S%H1696><s%> thee in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let us alone <S%H2308><s%>, that we may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>? For it had been better <S%H2896><s%> for us to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, than that we should die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> ye not, stand still <S%H3320><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which he will shew <S%H6213><s%> to you to day <S%H3117><s%>: for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> whom ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>, ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> them again <S%H3254><s%> no more for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>. for the: or, for whereas ye have seen the Egyptians to day
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you, and ye shall hold your peace <S%H2790><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Wherefore criest <S%H6817><s%> thou unto me? speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they go forward <S%H5265><s%>:

But lift thou up <S%H7311><s%> thy rod <S%H4294><s%>, and stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and divide <S%H1234><s%> it: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> ground through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And I, behold, I will harden <S%H2388><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and they shall follow <S%H935><s%> them <S%H310><s%>: and I will get me honour <S%H3513><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his host <S%H2428><s%>, upon his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and upon his horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I have gotten me honour <S%H3513><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, upon his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and upon his horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, which went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, removed <S%H5265><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them; and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> from before their face <S%H6440><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them:

And it came <S%H935><s%> between the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and it was a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and darkness <S%H2822><s%> to them, but it gave light <S%H215><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> to these: so that the one came not near <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H2088><s%> all the night <S%H3915><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea <S%H3220><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> caused the sea <S%H3220><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> back by a strong <S%H5794><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all that night <S%H3915><s%>, and made <S%H7760><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> dry <S%H2724><s%> land, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were divided <S%H1234><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> upon the dry <S%H3004><s%> ground: and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were a wall <S%H2346><s%> unto them on their right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and on their left <S%H8040><s%>.

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%>, and went in <S%H935><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them to the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, even all Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>, his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and his horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.

And it came to pass, that in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch <S%H821><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> unto the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> through the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> and of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and troubled <S%H2000><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>,

And took off <S%H5493><s%> their chariot <S%H4818><s%> wheels <S%H212><s%>, that they drave <S%H5090><s%> them heavily <S%H3517><s%>: so that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let us flee <S%H5127><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fighteth <S%H3898><s%> for them against the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>. that they: or, and made them to go heavily

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea <S%H3220><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> may come again <S%H7725><s%> upon the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, upon their chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and upon their horsemen <S%H6571><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the sea <S%H3220><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his strength <S%H386><s%> when the morning <S%H1242><s%> appeared <S%H6437><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> it; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H5287><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>. overthrew: Heb. shook off

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and the horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and all the host <S%H2428><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; there remained <S%H7604><s%> not so much as <S%H5704><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of them.

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> upon dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>; and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were a wall <S%H2346><s%> unto them on their right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and on their left <S%H8040><s%>.

Thus the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>; and Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> upon the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H8193><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H3027><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> upon the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and believed <S%H539><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and his servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>. work: Heb. hand
